Name: Forcepoint CSG
Author: Forcepoint
Description:
[Forcepoint Cloud Security Gateway](https://www.forcepoint.com/product/cloud-security-gateway) (CSG) Solution for Microsoft Sentinel exports web and/or email logs so that custom dashboards can be created using Workbooks to visualize events and insights on activities of Forcepoint Cloud Security Gateway.

For more details about this solution refer to [integration documentation](https://forcepoint.github.io/docs/csg_and_sentinel/).

1. **Forcepoint CSG via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting Forcepoint CSG logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**.

2. **Forcepoint CSG via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting Forcepoint CSG logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

**NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of Forcepoint CSG via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
